# part 2 A
s= 1+2+3+4+,...,+41+42

s= 42+41+,...,+4+3+2+1

2s= 43+43+43+43+,...,+43+42

2s= 43*42

2s= 1806

s= 1806 / 2

s= 903

s= Â£9.03
